title: Watering Tips
description: Most indoor plants prefer their soil to dry out slightly between waterings. Overwatering can lead to root rot, so always check the soil moisture before watering.

title: Sunlight Tips
description: Place your plants near bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid direct harsh sunlight for sensitive plants as it can scorch the leaves.

title: Fertilizing Tips
description: Feed your plants with a balanced, water-soluble fertilizer once a month during the growing season. Reduce feeding in winter when growth slows down.
